categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Tamaron was a clan leader of the Airam who agreed to help the Rebel Alliance during their campaign into the Airam sector.

It was Tamaron's engineers who helped the Rebels to transfer gravity wells from a stolen Immobilizer 418 cruiser to a Modified Strike Cruiser at the Airam factory facility Gallofree. Later, Tamaron agreed to supply the Rebels with much needed warheads.
